Reference

Basic workflow

Core functions for cancereffectsizeR analyses

CESAnalysis()

Create a cancereffectsizeR analysis

load_maf()

Load MAF-formatted somatic mutation data

trinuc_mutation_rates()

Calculate relative rates of trinucleotide-context-specific mutations by extracting underlying mutational processes

gene_mutation_rates()

Use dNdScv with tissue-specific covariates to calculate gene-level mutation rates

ces_snv()

Calculate selection intensity for single-nucleotide variants and amino acid changes

Epistasis

Assess pairwise epistasis between variants or genes

ces_gene_epistasis()

Gene-level epistasis

ces_epistasis()

Variant-level pairwise epistasis

Get variant info

select_variants()

Select and filter variants

baseline_mutation_rates()

Baseline mutation rate calculation

Data management

load_cesa()

Load a previously saved CESAnalysis object

add_variants()

Add variant annotations

add_covered_regions()

add_covered_regions

annotate_variants()

Annotate variants

Explore reference data

list_ces_ref_sets()

list_ces_ref_sets

list_ces_covariates()

list_ces_covariates

list_ces_signature_sets()

list_ces_signature_sets

get_ces_signature_set()

get_ces_signature_set

Create custom reference data

More coming soon!

build_RefCDS()

cancereffectsizeR's RefCDS builder

Mutational signatures

Additional methods and options for mutational signatures and trinuc mutation rates

suggest_cosmic_signatures_to_remove()

Identify mutational signatures to exclude from analysis

set_trinuc_rates()

Assign pre-calculated relative trinucleotide mutation rates

assign_group_average_trinuc_rates()

Skip mutational signature analysis and assign group average relative trinucleotide-context-specific mutation rates to all samples

run_deconstructSigs()

cancereffectsizeR wrapper for deconstructSigs

Accessors

Data accession functions that you probably won’t need (use cesa$maf, cesa$samples, etc. instead)

maf_records()

View data loaded into CESAnalysis

excluded_maf_records()

View excluded MAF data

get_sample_info()

View sample metadata

get_mutations()

Get lists of mutations and annotations

get_trinuc_rates()

Get expected relative trinucleotide-specific SNV mutation rates

get_signature_weights()

Get table of signature weights by tumor

get_gene_rates()

Get table of neutral gene mutation rates

snv_results()

View results from ces_snv
